This is the EDA completed by Ashlyn!

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gplots)
library(leaflet)

```





```{r}
trees <- read_csv(here("data", "trees1.csv"))
  
```


```{r}
head(trees)
```


```{r}
summary(trees)
```
```{r}

#This I want to look cooler...

trees |>
  count(SPECIES) |>
  arrange(desc(n)) 
```

```{r}
trees |>
  summarize(mean(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`), min(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`), max(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`))
```
```{r}

#Maybe only show a select grouping?

trees |>
  group_by(SPECIES_BIN) |>
  summarize(mean(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`), min(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`), max(`Diameter at Breast Heigh (DBH)`))
```


```{r}
# Just a plotting frame
leaflet(data = trees) |> 
  addTiles() |> 
  addCircles(color = col2hex("green"),lng = ~x, lat = ~y, opacity = 3, weight = 8)
```
